update tb_landmark_enterprise set product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise = #{enterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trademark = #{trademark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bulletin_number = #{bulletinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_time = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_institution = #{approvalInstitution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uniform_social_credit_code = #{uniformSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporate_representative = #{corporateRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period_of_validity = #{periodOfValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classification_id = #{classificationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, administrative_id = #{administrativeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select t1.city_id as area ,ifnull(t0.countNum,0) AS countNum from tb_administrative_area t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
SUBSTR(administrative_id FROM 1 FOR 4) as area , count(1 ) as countNum
administrative_id as area, count( 1 ) as countNum
FROM tb_landmark_enterprise where 1 = 1
and approval_time = #{year}
and classification_id IN ( SELECT classificationId FROM tb_classification WHERE parentId = #{classification} )
and administrative_id in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = #{parentId})
and administrative_id = #{parentId}
GROUP BY SUBSTR(administrative_id FROM 1 FOR 4) ORDER BY count(1) ) t0 on
SUBSTR(t1.city_id, 1, 4) = t0.area
t1.city_id = t0.area
where 1 = 1
and t1.city_id in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = '610000')
and t1.parent_id = #{parentId}
and t1.city_id = #{parentId}
order by countNum

SELECT approval_time as years,COUNT(1) FROM tb_landmark_enterprise WHERE 1 = 1
and classification_id in (select classificationId from tb_classification where parentId = #{classification})
and administrative_id in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = #{parentId})
and administrative_id = #{parentId}
GROUP BY approval_time ORDER BY approval_time
